column4: hi there i was wondering if anyone can help me with compiling .cpp files
im working on a little program in C++ language
not how I told you to do it
if you omit the '-o NAME' part, yes you get 'a.out'.  You can rut it by doing: ./a.out
what shoud be the extension of the source file
iostream.h?  You probably want just iostream...
for actual programming help you should ask ##c++
